description: Things can sometimes get a bit complicated when owners make special arrangements for themselves. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: 4 ownership rules that all property investors should know
title_page: 4 ownership rules that all property investors should know | The Straits Times
maintext:
Most of us know that our stake in a property is based on legal ownership, so if you and your spouse are joint owners, you both own the real estate in equal shares.
In some cases, the ownership is delineated in fixed proportions, such as 60-40 or 70-30, so your interest is based on the stake you hold.
